mapper.select: SELECT s.song_idx, s.play_mode, s.title, s.thumbnail_url, s.video_url, s.preview_music_url, m.motion_tag, s.difficulty, s.calorie_consumption FROM songList s LEFT JOIN motionType m ON s.motion_type_idx = m.motion_type_idx
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playRecord(child_idx, song_idx, play_mode) VALUES(#{childIdx}, #{songIdx}, #{playMode})

INSERT INTO scoreRecord(play_record_idx, motion_type_idx, count, time, count_standard, score) VALUES(#{playRecordIdx}, #{danceIdx}, #{count}, #{time}, #{countStandard}, #{score})
